author: Periodic Videos
description:
The 2025 Nobel Prize in Chemistry is awarded for the development of metal–organic frameworks (MOFs). More links and info in full description ↓↓↓

The prize was shared between Susumu Kitagawa, Richard Robson and Omar M. Yaghi.

This video features discussion with Martyn Poliakoff, Ben Pilgrim, Matthew Cliffe, and James Stephenson.

Read about the Nobel win at https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/chemistry/2025/summary/

See our playlist of videos about chemistry Nobel Prizes at: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9eEsN9D48mddEnxhyfM44MCw4F3PohOI

And physics Nobel Prizes at: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcUY9vudNKBNRA7qR5KbgdY1c5IWIJcqf

Ben Pilgrim: https://www.thepilgrimgroup.co.uk/ben-pilgrim
Matt Cliffe: https://cliffegroup.co.uk
Promethean Particles: https://prometheanparticles.co.uk

Videos on all 118 elements: http://bit.ly/118elements

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/periodicvideos

More chemistry at http://www.periodicvideos.com/
From the School of C
title: Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2025 - Periodic Table of Videos
